testcase.classname: user should be able to register to the E-commerce site
testcase.name: user could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to signup page..........................................passed When user enter valid data..................................................passed And user click create account button........................................passed Then user can create account successfully and go to homepage................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the E-commerce site
testcase.name: user could login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter valid "victoria_victoria@nopCommerce.com" and valid "123456".passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user can login successfully and go homepage............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: logged user can switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and password...........................passed When user switch between currencies.........................................passed Then currency of product changed............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for products
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "book"......................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "book"............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for products 2
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "laptop"....................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "laptop"..........................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for products 3
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "nike"......................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "nike"............................passed

testcase.classname: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user could rest password with valid Email
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user click forget password button......................................passed And user enter valid Email and user click recover Button....................passed Then user recieve Instruction mail to rest password.........................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: logged user can add products to whishList
